NAME.Nominative: Martyr Themistocles of Myra in Lycia (â€ 251)

LIFE.Copyright: Bulgakov Handbook. Copyright 1999-2008 Archpriest Eugene D. Tarris.

SAINT.LIFE: He was born in Myra in Lycia and was a shepherd of his flock. During the Decius persecution he fearlessly confessed himself a Christian, was tortured for this and beheaded by the sword in the year 251.
